name: UpdateTaskPosition
description:
Update the position of a task within its current stage.

Use this tool to adjust the order of tasks within the same stage in a project. This is useful for reorganizing tasks based on priority or progress within a project's existing structure.

parameters.name: task_identifier
parameters.description: A UUID string specifying the task to be updated.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this task.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: The ID of the project for accessing or modifying tasks. Obtainable via a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: new_task_position
parameters.description: The new integer position for the task within its current stage.
